title: How and when did slavery start? - Quora

response.answer_text:
Slavery is blemish on the history and character of humankind, call it what you will, it is known by many names:
bondage, enslavement, servitude, subjugation, thraldom, thrall, serfdom, vassalage,enthralment, yoke etc Slavery has been around since time immemorial with its excess’ being perfected by colonists in the 1800s. Slaves existed during roman times and were treated as commodities that could be bought or sold,their masters having power over their lives and deaths. Slavery existed as long as humans have been on this earth, even though legally abolished,it is still practized in certain remote areas of the world.

The history of slavery dates back easily over 2000 years. slaves built the pyramids…(although that is now up for debate) peasants during those times weren't treated much better than slaves. As long as humans have fought over territory and claimed superiority slavery has existed.
